creator: hafner@mail.csi.cuny.edu
text:
After editing a jsp and restarting tomcat, When opening the editing page 
through a browser for the first time a message of "server not found" for the 
title of the page. The page displays correctly displays in the browser, only 
the title is incorrect. Upon refreshing the title is correctly displayed.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text: This is browser bug. I have seen this happen for non-tomcat based sites too.
